details: Acquisition of data in the form of coordinates as a function of time using various G Censors placed on people exercising at the gym.
Use Dynamic Time Warping applied to each axis as a comparison criterion.
Processing in python to implement an algorithm based on the different values found with the DTW method (pandas, numpy, dtw-python, scikit-learn).

Creation of a web reporting MVP for data: Data exploration and processing with python (pandas, numpy).
Creating a Web interface with an authentication system (HTML, JS, PHP).
Allocation of a dedicated virtual machine connected to a DNS to bring the interface online.

Maintenance and updating of a web applic: Development of new connection information and account management features with an LDAP authentication system (Python dash, flask, python-ldap).
Maintenance de CI/CD sur nos serveurs internes avec github CI/CD.
Installation and integration of an LDAP: Understanding LDAP concepts, installation and security for different needs.
Integration of LDAP as an authentication system for various projects (Python, JS).
DPO (Data Protection Officer): Verification that the use of internal project data complies with the GDPR.

Implementation of data pipelines to extr: Development python scripts orchestrated with MWAA in order to store data from advertising platforms into a Datalake.
Creation of ETL with AWS Athena queries and Python Script triggered with MWAA in order to create a data Warehouse.
Database management with AWS S3 using partitions in order to make each Airflow job idempotent and optimised for querying.
Deployement of python application in ord: Development and deployement a REST Api on AWS lambda with Chalice in order to retrieve data for a front-end web dashboard.
Development of an internal python packag: Development of a python interface to retrieve data directly from the Facebook ads and Google ads platforms for different granularities and KPIs.
Compliance with python package standards and dependency management.
CI/CD maintenance to automatically deploy this package on AWS CodeArtifact.
